Docs.param: The context object for the turn.
New replacement activity.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
Docs.summary: Replaces an existing activity in the .
Docs.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.
Docs.remarks:
If the activity is successfully sent, the task result contains a object containing the ID that the receiving channel assigned to the activity.
Before calling this, set the ID of the replacement activity to the ID of the activity to replace.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.TestAdapter Use (Microsoft.Bot.Builder.IMiddleware middleware);

Public Function Use (middleware As IMiddleware) As TestAdapter
override this.Use : Microsoft.Bot.Builder.IMiddleware -> Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Adapters.TestAdapter

Docs.param: The middleware to add.
Docs.summary: Adds middleware to the adapter's pipeline.
Docs.remarks: Middleware is added to the adapter at initialization time. For each turn, the adapter calls middleware in the order in which you added it.
